ai-tha-ap208:1.1_0: “Amongst those who have seen the ascetic,
ai-tha-ap208:1.4_0: I am the master of the three Vedas.
ai-tha-ap208:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap208:3.2_0: I am the one who gives water
ai-tha-ap208:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap208:3.4_0: this is the fruit for the donor.
ai-tha-ap208:4.1_0: In a single stricken by one eons
ai-tha-ap208:4.2_0: like a flock of birds iron,
ai-tha-ap208:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Protector.
ai-tha-ap208:7.1_0: he gave the sixth Elder Nun Earth
